actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the regular investment tax credit for domestically produced property.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal provisions which terminated the regular percentage used in determining the investment tax credit for general business property. Revises provisions concerning property that is completed abroad or is predominantly of foreign origin.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to restore the regular investment tax credit for domestically produced property.
